properties.areaDesc: Mississippi, MO; New Madrid, MO; Fulton, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued March 1 at 10:49AM CST until March 2 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...Missouri...

Mississippi River at New Madrid affecting Fulton...Mississippi and
New Madrid Counties

.The Mississippi River at New Madrid Missouri will continue to fall
steadily. The river will fall below flood stage at New Madrid this evening.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at New Madrid.
* until late tonight.
* At 10:00 AM Sunday the stage was 34.6 feet.
* Flood Stage is 34.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by
this evening.
* Impact...At 34.0 Feet...Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly
bottomland and surrounding low lying areas.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
